org.treetank.access
Class NodeReadTrx

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.access.NodeReadTrx
All Implemented Interfaces:
INodeReadTrx
public class NodeReadTrx
extends Object
implements INodeReadTrx

NodeReadTrx

Read-only transaction wiht single-threaded cursor semantics. Each read-only transaction works on a given revision key.

          State of transaction including all cached stuff.

close

public void close()
           throws AbsTTException
Close shared read transaction and immediately release all resources. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the transaction is already closed.

Specified by:
close in interface INodeReadTrx
Throws:
AbsTTException - If can't close Read Transaction.
